targets.query: from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "availability") |> group() |> mean()
from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> group() |> count()

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> group() |> distinct(column: "tenant_id") |> count()

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "latency") |> group() |> mean()

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "error_rate") |> group() |> mean()

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "availability") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["value"] >= 99.0) |> group() |> count()

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "throughput") |> group() |> max()

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> group() |> distinct(column: "service_name") |> count()

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "latency") |> group(columns: ["service_name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "throughput") |> group(columns: ["service_name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "availability") |> group(columns: ["service_name", "tenant_id"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "error_rate") |> group(columns: ["service_name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> group(columns: ["sla_tier"]) |> count()

from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "availability") |> group(columns: ["tenant_id"]) |> mean() |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
